data.sentence: The word وَمَاءٍ comes from the root م و ه and is associated with the meanings: water, rain

data.meanings: to pour out/forth. maskub - ever flowing, falling from heights.
data.sentence: The word مَسْكُوبٍ comes from the root س ك ب and is associated with the meanings: to pour out/forth. maskub - ever flowing, falling from heights.
